participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and down-to-earth, Emily enjoys simple pleasures and has a nurturing side.
participant_1.background: i work for our local supermarket. my favorite food is pizza with black olives. i've a cat named spook. i've never been out of ohio.

participant_2.background: my family doesn't support my career choices. i currently work for a watch dealer. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i often shop for shoes and watches. i like shopping.
